content.altitude: Landed, Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Since my incident on 11-29-2012 i have been doing continuous research trying to find other people who seem to have seen some of the same things i have seen. i always read your e-mails and sometimes the sightings are so similar to mine that i feel they might be the same object? i apologize for the length but it was the most miraculous experience of my life, i felt the details needed to be shared. 

please note: this was written and submitted the very night it happened when everything was still fresh in my head

11-29-2012:

i was sitting in my basement (i have a ranch style house-normal floor and downstairs but no up stairs) with my dad and my mom came down yelling at him about a fight they had earlier. it turned into a big screaming mess between the three of us so i stormed out my basement door to my backyard to get some fresh air.  went back inside for a minute and while i was looking out my basement window i noticed these flying lights behind a tree but stopped paying attention quickly because the fight started again so again i stormed outside. i went and sat and faced the tree i saw the bright lights coming from. i'd actually been keeping my eye on that tree the past few nights because i noticed a lot of lights coming from behind the tree recently but assumed it was a busy plane area or something...But at the same time, i like aliens, so in the back of my mind i was always questioning "could that be a ufo??" but of course, it was always a plane. tonight though the lights were really bright and there were a lot of them. when i first saw it i assumed maybe it was a helicopter search but again, in the back of my mind i secretly hoped it would be ufo's. that's why when a pair of the flying lights started coming towards me i thought i was going insane. 

remember, i'm out here alone. my parents are inside fighting still and i know that because i can hear them. for some reason i didn't pay much attention to the light that was coming towards my direction. i was still riled up from what had been going on inside seconds ago then come out to these flying lights headed in my direction? i think it was so much of a shocker that i didn't really realize it was actually happening. for a minute, i genuinely thought i was just going crazy and seeing things so i didn't pay attention to it because i didn't want to think i was crazy! i was also trying to get my dog to stop biting my pants so i had completely looked away from the lights. i heard a boy yell for his dog to come in and wondered if it was because they saw the lights too. the next time i looked up at what i had convinced myself was an illusion, it was flying over my house and that was the last time i saw it.

 i turned around to face my back yard again and saw another pair of the same lights coming towards me again.  at this point i started paying attention.  i started getting frustrated actually. i didn't know what was going on and what these were and if they were even actual things or my just imagination. and my dog was still biting my pants. i studied the lights and wondered if it was men working on the telephone poles. or some neighbor who went over the top and got moving christmas lights.  as i was watching it more lights from different areas started popping up from what seems like literally no where. unfortunately, i really can not give too much description to what any of them look like. i was just trying to figure out what was going on. at this point i could spin in a circle and see one in every direction. if they didn't have lights i wouldn't have seen them. it was very dark and some of them were weaving in and out of my trees as well as my neighbors trees. one looked very huge, bigger than any of them, and black and robot type that seemed to take up the entire sky. 

i can describe one of them for sure though. it was in the shape of a boomerang/triangle. 
it was white with green and blue lights and maybe red but i don't think so. it had a black dome on top. it was definitely the prettiest one i could point out. i was standing in my fenced-in pool area of my backyard and it looked like the ufo was in either my non-fenced-in backyard area or in my neighbors backyard. regardless, it was close, maybe 100 feet away. i feel like others got within 100 feet of me as well but they were never stopped, they just came to cut through my back yard and went over my house, and carried on. but since this one was stopped and the only one i could really see, (its whole surface was lighten up with lights - mostly white with blue and green circle shaped lights) i focused all my attention to it because trying to take it all in was obviously not happening. it was only landed for a short period of time. 15 seconds? then began to lift itself, flying  straight up into the air. once it got to a certain height, (just above the height of my house) it started accelerating forward instead of upwards. 

i turned to face my house, the direction where all the ufo's had been headed. i noticed how big and full and beautiful the moon was. it was the biggest i have ever seen the moon be, almost the size of my house it seemed. i think the last ufo i saw was the same as the first. it had the same lights and seemed like an old pick up truck mixed with a old fashioned car that was orange with purple. it looked as if it were maybe metallic? it seemed very futuristic and while it flew it left a light blue  trail like a plane does but it lasted a much shorter time than planes do.  i wondered if any of my other neighbors had been watching any of this too. i also wondered what the hell i just experienced, if it was even real or not. too bad my only other whiteness was my dog who was still biting my pants.

current day: for the past year and a half i still have flashbacks to that experience and expect to probably for the rest of my life. since this day, i have had the weird feeling of being watched when i'm alone at night but i might just be being paranoid!!!! i would really love some possible answers if you can seem to find any. thank you so much for your time.
-jenna
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Over 10 ufo's spotted at together over a year ago..Still looking to share my story and get some answers!!!!!!

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
It was approximately 10am and i was driving north towards espanola from santa fe when i first saw this unusual craft with a small emissions tail/trail. truthfully this would be the first time i've ever seen exhaust coming out of a celestial aircraft in my over 200 plus sightings from 2010 to the present, and hundreds before. i'm a bit suspicious because of that fact, that it even is celestial in nature. they don't usually leave exhaust but be that as it may, that morning i saw the ubiquitous chem trails in front of me up in the sky, and something in them.

at first i saw a very faint con trail and/or glow up where the chem trails were when all of a sudden i saw a small cylindrical, with an offset dome on top, type craft appear, and go across the sky up amongst the trails. at first it went in one direction, east to west and then, exactly as i saw it go one way, i saw it go the opposite direction, west to east. each time there was a faint glow as if it were somewhat cloaked cept the contrail and then it would appear.

the reason why i say i'm a bit suspicious is because . .. well, this is new mexico after all; los alamos, las cruces, white sands notwithstanding roswell, so a new type of military craft that sprays deadly chemicals on unsuspecting citizens could explain it. however after hundreds of sightings, you kind of get the feel on how celestial crafts operate and move and navigate. i believe it is exactly what i saw. i can provide sketches as well.

when the "big guns" in aircraft came out and continued to spray their chem trails with a vengeance, seems that's when the "small craft" disappeared. is there some connection one to the other? i think so but... that is another story.
content.summary: Strange craft with emmisions flying in the chemtrails counteracting aerial spray?

content.detailedDescription: I have seen two. one black with three lights in triangle shape a d one circular and gray in color. our home and fields are a hot spot for military and ufo activities.You just have to come and see this. we are a military family.Not a bunch of people making false claims. i would appreciate someone's help.
content.summary: Walked outside clear sunny day when all of a sudden the wind started blowing real hard. i looked to the east to see if there were dark clouds or rain. i heard a buzzing noise and saw a gray dull circular  craft coming  right at me. it was in distress.

content.detailedDescription:
On the evening of april 20, 2014 (easter sunday) my wife and i, along with her brother and his friend, returned to my home after eating out easter dinner. at about 7pm, the four of us went out into my backyard to enjoy a relaxing time in my hot tub. 
around 730pm, i was looking up at the stars above my back yard. it was a crystal clear evening. i was curious about what i was looking at, so i used google skymap to identify the 'little dipper' (ursa minor) constellation right above my head. 
while i was looking at the little dipper, two (what i thought were stars) began moving. they were on opposite sides of the little dipper 'bowl' area, basically to the left and right. these two lights moved towards each other in a straight line, when they came within an inch of each other (from my view) they swirled around each other twice, then moved off in opposite directions in a straight now. 
the lights did not stop at the original locations that i first noticed them, they kept moving away until i could no longer see them. this whole event lasted about 90 seconds of so. i thought to myself, these 'lights' were too far away to be planes, and i know of no man-made technology that can perform the maneuver that i witnessed.
content.summary: Two lights at starlike distance moved towards each other, swirled around each other, moved off in opposite directions.

content.detailedDescription:
Before i left to run my errands, i had a discussion with a friend that of all the over 200 plus sightings i've had between the years of 2010 to the present, which many i reported to mufon most of which occurred in redding california, i had never seen a saucer like craft before, only mostly huge orbs, diamond shape, rectangles large and small and one almost industrial looking in nature.

at 11:20am i was on my way and going up a rise on the way to the freeway i noticed a light moving; a reflective light. after the experiences i've had with how et craft move, how they appear and disappear, cloak and change and leave the planet with a bright light before exiting our atmosphere, i realized it was one of my celestial friends an not aircraft belonging to earth.

as i observed the light it appeared as an elongated, huge craft that at first i thought was cylindrical in shape but before disappearing in the atmosphere, it tilted towards me and i could see that it was a huge saucer like craft albeit a very smooth and streamlined looking one with reflective outside materials. it tilted towards me and then just disappeared.

i always feel great after seeing my celestial friends come by to say hello. i am in contact with them constantly and have been interviewed and written about because of my sightings, even to the point where the headline read, "is redding the new hotspot" or something to that effect and interviewed by roger marsh's online program. i am writing about my experiences and of the connection's i have with et, as they communicate with me daily and have left a symbol which i am still trying to understand.

i have no sketches to submit now but i can draw one if you want to see it.
content.summary: Just driving when saucer like craft appeared, tilted some then disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
Exiting building from work at 9:06pm; weather conditions; sun below horizon; wind from west 3 miles per hour; visibility 10 miles; weather  a few clouds; sky condition - few060 & few250; air 76 degrees; dew point -44; rel humidity  32%;

witnessed   viewing towards 260 degrees (west) 30 degrees above the horizon a bight orange/ red solid illumination.  (light did not flash like an aviation beacon nor did it appear to be aircraft light landing lights)  watched  solid orange red light grow larger and increase in horizon as it appeared to be in a  straight flight path  

at 50 degrees above the horizon the light appeared to become distorted and illumination dulled (light a photoshop blur effect) distortion was still visible but dull. at 80 degrees above the horizon past over head south facing backdown to 70 degrees over the horizon a round disc object was observed through thin clouds.  

object traveled distance from 260 degrees west  to 100 degrees  east over a period of four minutes.  flight path observed was straight line.  

no sound heard.  i assumed light might be satellite /  until  distortion and disc through clouds observed.  f

one other commercial aircraft with flashing red aviation beacon from north heading south appeared to be making flight adjustment around the unidentified object flight path that i observed. (assumed to be a departure from pdx airport)

no other unusual activity observed in sky during drive home (west) that evening.
content.summary: Solid illumination orange red light became masked disk observed straight overhead through clouds

content.detailedDescription:
I woke up at 1:30 am for no reason. i looked around my room as if someone had just woken me up. i turned to my bed which has a window over it. i saw bright red light through the drape. i pulled the drapes back and observed the following: two bright circular red lights in the sky coming from above the next housing development. the lights were not close to the ground and were stationary in the sky. i could see what appeared to be a mass between the two red light as it was connecting the two together. i will pause in my description of events to say what it was not. it was not an aircraft or helicopter. it was not planets nor lights from a tower. what i observed was a distinct, real, tangible large object hovering above in mid-sky. after about 10 seconds a white object slowly descended from the object heading straight for the ground. just as the white object was about to hit the ground (or rooftops in this case)it turned sharply and moved parallel to the ground very quickly. approximately 3 seconds later it turned toward the sky and accelerated very fast. in an instant it seemed to disappear and i was unable to observe it further. the main object was still in the sky in the same location it had been when first observed. the red lights seemed to "blink" or "flash" for approximately 2 seconds. after the object stopped blinking the lights became weaker for an instant and then disappeared completely. my impression: the thing looked like the wide end of a giant pair of binoculars, with red lights replacing clear lenses, and a black part in between where the focus would be. 

conclusion: i witnessed a real event with unidentified objects performing turns and acceleration beyond that of a natural occurrence. every move the objects made was so distinct and precise that it is my conclusion that intelligent thought was behind these objects.

thank you and sincerely,
pete
content.summary: Observed stationary black object with two bright red lights

content.detailedDescription: Me and my brother played shuttle using a ball on that time. we played in front of our home. ball fall on the roof while playing. we were small boys an that time. my uncle was passing by we called him to help. he went on top to take that ball. at the time he bent down on the roof to take the ball. it happened. a 1 to 2 feet long missile like structured flew above him fast. i was like a rocket. which flew fast but without a loud sound. the sound came because of its speed or friction with air. but too it was a little hum. it was gold like color all over its body shape. i saw it for just 3 to 4 sec it flew like a real rocket in silent. my uncle suddenly looked up and it went so fast. i saw some kind of black dots in that ufo. i was 10 yrs old. but it was real. don't think this is a child story. still i can feel it. i thought of why i didn't i went to pick the ball. if i was on that time i felt to grab that missile in my hand and to fly. it flew like a rocket. i commented that  it might crossed our locality this time on that moment. i didn't realise that it was  a ufo. but thought some small creatures might fly that one. but i realized those moments when i was at my graduation time. i am an aeronautical engineer now. i beleive in ufos. we are not alone. i am sure.
content.summary: It was like a small missile in gold color. which flew fast without a loud sound about 15 feet from ground.

content.detailedDescription: Went into back yard around 8:30 pm facing west. say object in sky ascending and descending then it speed off to the south then turned straight up at a 90 degree turn then hovered. then headed straight back north again then shot straight down with a 90 degree turn to horizon. seconds later reappeared in a ascending direction hovered descended ascended again shot off again. i called my wife and stepson out to watch it. this went on for maybe 5 min. or longer. i work at sky harbor airport as a a&p mechanic and was in the air force working on f-16's. acft. or helicopters don't move like this. i have no idea what this was but sure would love to know. i checked the local news but saw nothing. any ideas? thx, allen bannister ps the lights were very bright. i tried to video it with my ph. but you can't see it but you can hear us talking about the event.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Red green blue light. not acft. or heilcopter

content.detailedDescription: Since first spotting the flying objects in late dusk, i go out in front yard and back and see them every night unless raining and cloudy. when i first noticed the objects, thought it was stars until i started taking photos of the objects. that is when i realized it was not stars that i was taking picture of. they are present every night from dusk to dawn.
content.summary: Observed every night from dusk to dawn, always in the same place.

content.detailedDescription: 1. i woke up on january 5,1980, approximately 12:45 am, let my dog out to go the bathroom, when i went out i saw the object east of me at the other hill, illuminating white and 5 square windows, seeing bright yellow. once i saw the object, i flick the lamppost lights to get my dog by me, then i saw a human like being shut the lights in the middle window, inside and out , which flew towards me in a minute, my dog was still out. a strong current,stronger than a electrical,  paralyzed me, my dog was outside still,lost sense of time for 20 minutes and sweating allot that time and all week.My dog nose bleed, and died september of lymph cancer.This took place in paterson, nj, bordering wayne and totowa. when i first saw the object i thought it was russian, so i did report it to the air force local recruiting station in wayne, nj. some major came and i told him about the sighting. when i communicated with the being , they told me things and events are suppose to happen. my thought to them why not reveal themselves now, they told me that humanity is immature, hostile, and not to tell no one because no one would believe this happened. they said to me that in the near future they will be back for me because i know how to communicate with them. i lost sight of the object going west in front of my house i use to live towards wayne and pennsylvania. from that time on it has affected my mental and physical health in many ways, full of anxiety, stress, and depression,anemic in the 1980's from it also. when i worked for a company in the 1980's, around september 1986, a co worker mentioned that his aunt seen a ufo at forty fort , pa too. then i said i seen the same thing, and that your aunt is not crazy. ever since then i experience i have been not right since, it haunts me. the trauma from time to time brings out the situation, medication is not helping since 1991, had ulcers in the 1980's,and i also read alot thinking i am missing something. when a major came to take the report questions asked where the shape, did i ever see "star wars", and "close encounters of the third kinds", i said no. i did not watch much tv, busy studying and school. he mentioned to keep it quiet because of national security.
content.summary: This gray disc shape could hold 21  747 airplanes, it flew east to west, core of the craft white energy,flew above 2 feet above trees and houses, telepathy with the beings, lost twenty  minutes, my dog nose was bleeding died of lymph cancer 9 months later

content.detailedDescription:
I was working my usual overnight shift of 10p to 6a on a friday or saturday night. i am a town police officer and have worked overnight for four years. i drove to the out skirts of the village to get out and stretch my legs for a brief moment at the same location i always do. i don't know why, but something made me turn and look up. i did so. i then saw a bright green pulsing orb like craft hovering approx 50 degrees above the horizon line. i did not feel any type of fear. i felt safe and intrigued. i stood there for about ten minutes and observed the object. it continued to pulse consistently for the entire encounter. as i observed the object moved slowly to the right, back to the left and back to the right. it did this briefly, stopped and repeated this motion. i was so astonished by what i was witnessing that i called a friend on the phone who is not a police officer, and stood there talking with them on the phone as i observed. they were equally amazed. the object did not leave me, i left it. i now regret getting in the car and driving away. i wished i would have stayed and tried to communicate. i realized this about 15 minutes later and returned to the site, but the object had moved on. i have many times since returned to that area hoping to see it/them again but have yet to. i have always had an open mind to such things as i was raised by an open minded mother. myself and my older brothers discuss such things openly with one another. it is my experience that i have also been part in abduction. what i can recall of these interactions is peaceful and respectful. at no time have i felt threatened or "captured". my mother feels alike as abduction and other paranormal activity have been a regular part of her life, as well as her mother. my experiences seem to center more around abduction and less around other types or paranormal activity. in my experience, i have had embryonic samples taken from me. i was told "these are going to be used to make babies". i have also been part in de-sensitization activities where it seems as though we were working on reducing the "fear factor" that occurs in many of these encounters. on other occasions i have been shown holographic examples of magnetic engines, which may be used for short distance bursts in travel. i am not certain of their function; as it is only a fragmented memory recall. regardless these interactions in my experience have been peaceful, and dare i say rather enjoyable. it is my personal opinion that i consider the specific beings i have had encounters with to be of a non-threatening nature. i do call them my friends. as i did not feel coerced nor kidnapped. these beings were "greys". this is one persons perspective. form your own. i cannot say whether or not these beings were the ones operating the green orb like craft described above. i would be happy to speak with mufon further and in more detail on this subject or any of the above. please feel free to contact me via email and cell phone.

thank you

sheena
content.summary: For whatever reason , i turned to look over my shoulder and i saw the geen pulsing orb like crat, hovering there. it moved to the left, right and back and forth like as such for about 10 min. i left. they stayed there. i did not feel fear at all

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving towards west on chinden blvd. it was around 8:15am. to my north / west was this massive bell shaped object hovering in the sky. it just stayed there. in scale, it appeared to be larger than a hot air balloon. 

i tried asking others about the sighting, they just guessed it may have been a hot air balloon. i did not have my pro-camera so i used my phone to click a few pictures.

the object was in the sky for 5 mins that i saw and then it descended behind the tree line.
content.summary: It was a massive bell shaped object stationary in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside at around 2:00 am by my car getting some fresh air, and i saw a low flying "object" suddenly appear - it looked like a group of small dull white dots (20-30) clustered together. it was north in the sky here in plano, tx, about 100 feet up. the "object" then turned into a group of white doves (about 20-30 - i am not making this up), and they "faded" into the night sky. it was weird, and i was suddenly afraid when i saw it - i don't know why. not exactly normal.

i felt as if "something" wanted to come get me - i.E. ufo abduction. i was scared to death, and i ran like hell to get away. i felt the "dove object" could see me, and that it wanted to "come get me".

i ran to the local gas station just to be near people, and i would not come back to my home until i felt safe. i stayed around the gas station until 6 am.

again, i went outside my home just to get some fresh air, and i normally do this. this has never happened my entire life. i lost sight of it because i was scared out of my mind & ran away. i felt the weird object/thing could see me, and had me "targeted" (i was in it's 'crosshairs'). i have done time in the usaf with honors, and with the us army as a it consultant in iraq - i don't scare too easily. i believe "it" wanted to abduct me, and i ran away.
content.summary: Ufo sighting - plano, texas - may 2nd, 2014

content.detailedDescription:
i am 50 yr old male retired soldier. i have finnished hs and associates degree in business. i was at national training center (ntc) ft erwin, cal. majave desert @ april to july 2002. myself and one other was alone about a week in desolate position in desert. one night as we lay on our cot out in the open under the bright stars we watched for shooting stars and passing sattelites also iridium flares. it was about ten o'clock pm, we then noticed a light like that of a star. the light was different we both noticed it at the same time. we began talking about it, we even jokingly scoffed that it was a ufo. the light was getting brighter, it was not moving. we had time to discuss what it may be, we had time for discussion the entire event took maybe 7 minutes. the light was getting brighter by the second then suddenly it was so bright i looked at my friend and he looked at me and "it lit up our faces!" we was suddenly shocked, scared even, my adrenaline kicked in. 

the light then began to dim at about the same rate as it brightened minutes before. i got up when we no longer could see the light at all and went to our radio, i could hear different units reporting to our headquarters about seeing what we saw. we discussed what we seen and both agreed we saw a super novea or maybe a beam of light from a pulsar. my question is did we indeed see a known or undiscovered super novea event? below is a little more info about our training before we went to iraq in 2004. 

the largest movement of military equipment in the state since the tennessee maneuvers of world war ii began on 26 april 2002 at fort campbell, ky. tennessee's largest national guard combat force, the 278th armored cavalry regiment, undertook it's greatest training challenge on 01 june 2002 at the national training center (ntc) in fort irwin, california. but first the 5,000 plus members of the regiment shipped everything from m-1 abrams tanks and blackhawk helicopters to individual helmets and computers to this remote training area in southern california. the national training center (ntc) is the premier training center for the united states army. it is located in the heart of the mohave desert, and is the most realistic combat training scenario in the world. it's harsh environment and excellent opposing force soldiers test the endurance, knowledge, and resourcefulness of both active duty and reserve component forces. tennessee's equipment constituted more than 585 rail cars being shipped from 5 different locations beginning on 26 april and continuing during the month of may. 

i sent this same letter to cornell university.  they wrote back "maybe it was a balloon"! 

i have spent years  thinking about this event also studying astronomy and watching iridium flares. this was no flare!
content.summary: Object was in deep space and increased to unbelievable bright intensity.

content.detailedDescription: Picked up my son from college while drive down i80  he turns to me a says what that it streaked a crossed the sky  then just stopped first i saw it i said that's a blimp. then i looked again this time i could see it better we where talking he said that's no blimp there in no basket under it it is proud and smooth i say yea your right beside they wouldn't fly a blimp.In this weather was raining, and the closest thing near that is gaint statum and they are not playing football and the next closet thing over that way is newark airport. then we watched it start rising then just took off and was gone in a matter of seconds. the very min  it left search lights came on look as throw from the airport. was very strange. the color was blue/white in color
content.summary: Oval shaped blue/white light hovered then rose up skyward then took off and was gone in a matter of seconds

content.detailedDescription: This is an approximate time frame on the report. i have others and will make full disclosure since talking to ken pfeifer and i am making the first step towards that end.  this report is corelated closely to my past one due to the color of this object. they are the same in nature, and unique to anything ever observed in the sky by myself. intense redish, orange, purple combination. unwaivered constant colored ball of light, very sharp and distinct, and unatural. first observed at an apparent height normaly associated with a commercial plane at altitude. first seen at about 35 degrees approaching from the the ssw. it made a gradual sweeping right hand turn in an arc to the the sse at an elevation of 85 degrees in front of me.  i was facing south at appproximately 9 pm. what was different from what a commercial plane would look like is the fact the color was highly unusual and unique, and the turn was unusal. no color change, strobes, or navigation lights. general aviation and comercial traffic that i have regularly observed for decades do not look or turn like this. constant was color, size, shape, and altitude. apparent size of craft was that of an  airliner at altitude and crusing speed. duration of event was 30 or less seconds. visibility was unlimted. there was no sound. i wish to be contacted by a mufon investigator.
content.summary: Unique colored  ball of light unseen before flying in a controlled manner making an unusual turn at high altitude. not commercial traffic.
content.locationName: Various due to flight pat, New Jersey

content.detailedDescription: In scottsdale az visiting my cousin. friday april 25, about 8-9 pm, eating dinner outside.  looked up to see stars, and noticed near where the sun had set, an object hovering for a few seconds.  then it took off in unusual patterns, up, down, sideways, etc. 4 people were with me looking at it, and they thought it could be a remote controlled plane.  but i didn't think so, as it went up into a cloud at one point.  it was rectangular, with 3 blue lights and 3 red lights (i think the red lights were on top but i'm not absolutely sure).  i took pictures with my cell phone and videos as well, that did not turn out well due to the darkness.  the lights did not blink, they were steady.  i was excited to see it, and ran to the front yard to get a better look, with my nephew.  he also saw it disappear into a cloud which made us think it was not a remote controlled plane.  however, it last appeared going down to the ground (or at least low enough that houses blocked our view).  we waited a few minutes but it did not reappear.  it was in the sw sky, a little west of the flight path of jets flying into sky harbor. the total time we saw it fly was about 10 mins.
content.summary: 3 red lights over 3 blue lights hovering, dropping, ascending, zigzagging.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Stargazing on my front lawn with my boyfriend at around 9:20pm v shape, no sound, no lights very fast heading south to san deigo seen in san bruno . hugeand was dull almost like it was camouflaged by a light cloud.. ran around the block to see more of it but it flew out of site and wouldnt of been able to be seen by taking a picture.
content.summary: At around 9:20pm v shape, no sound, no lights very fast heading south to san deigo seen in san bruno . hugeand was dull almost like it was camouflaged by a light cloud..

content.detailedDescription: I am the asd for missouri mufon and was traveling with my husband on our way home from a trip to north carolina.  we were about 30 miles west of knoxville on hwy 40 in a lot of traffic, when i noticed a small plane cross in front of us headed north to south, and as i watched the plane i noticed another craft under it. this craft was apparently headed west to east, directly towards us and appeared to be moving very slowly. it was a bullet-shape, and silvery, metallic in color, with a wide round front end and coming to a point in back. the shape of it reminded me of a 1950's car part. there were no wings or tail, and no red or green lights or flashing strobe as would be expected with normal aircraft. i would guess that it was flying at between 1,000 - 2,000 ft. and it was very large, bigger than a golfball held at arm's length. i remarked about this to my husband, but he was driving and could not see the craft. there was a very large light on the front of the object, which was a circular shape with curved edges, and an indentation inside the circle, then a bulging center. the light was a soft, glowing blue/white color, with it being darker on the outside rim and lighter on the inside. it was so dull that i would not have noticed it had i not been looking at the small plane just prior to seeing this object. as we drove, i followed the object as it flew over head, almost directly, but slightly to the south of our position and continued on.  i then lost sight of it due to traffic and lights. this has to be the strangest ufo i've ever seen or heard of, even though i do quite a few ufo investigations.  there was no sound and we had no residual effects, except i wonder what it could have been.
content.summary: Bullet-shaped ufo with huge blue glowing light at front

content.detailedDescription: I was in my backyard, talking on the phone with a friend, and i saw a white light that looked like a dull star move across the sky, starting north west heading north east. i said something to her about it while i was on the phone with her. she saw it as it hit north east, went straight up into the sky and flash green and purple. then it went down again in the same path, and went from north east to northwest again at a quick speed when i lost sight of it. my friend and i were disconnected from our conversation after some heavy static as the object was making its way northwest.
content.summary: Looked like a dull star, occasionally blinking purple or green

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Looked out bathroom window in the middle of a movie can't say why seen a reddish/pink cloud w/ a brite yellowish glowing light at the end of cloud ,so reached for binoculars and aimed to where glowing is i seen in that cloud a shape of a round planet sorta it all of a sudden i started to feel something just wasn't sure what? i kept on looking into that planet looking circle in the clouds and out of nowhere this round disk shaped drk red/ orange thing came out at me from the cloud as if it knew i was focused on its shape in the cloud , i felt it knew because came out fast hovered some ,then turned its disk flat sideway view , i mean i seen detail on its body drk/greyish lines making its shape of middle to end also some kinda symbols on it seriously not english but symbols in the middle at first light was dimmed but lite like a laser dimmed out but there, after getting a good ass look i felt they or it actually let me see ,then started slowly moving closer & closer before moving it turned its body back flat sideways disc looking side view moving yet spinning & hovering , i started to pray thee our father but not being scared but fascinated & it was beautiful & unbelievable it looked like & felt i was amazed maybe it came very close to top of my backyard bathroom window but yet being up there lower then clouds above power lines & trees but up there in between both lets say omg " i screamed out hallelujah yehovah gloria cristo" amazed with whatever it was i just know i wasn't afraid at all it up rooted and left towards n/e & dimmed out of my view i only wish i had my video camera binoculars ....
mufon " i do know whatever it was tears rolled out my eyes when it up rooted because a beam of bright light hit my eyes that made them water afterward i guess??? o~yeah almost forgotten i can actually see little orbs like falling out of it at the time i was trying to really make out the symbols on its body when it was turned face circular a whole flat circle face ward toward me .... i really didn't know if u record off your records so you only have my word , but i'm being honest and real it was amazing.......  
something wanted me to see that because i was watching a good moving ... thank you for reading my wonderful experience ... let me know if anyone else seen what i seen please~ please....
content.summary: Circular drk red/orange disc came out of pink rose cloud corner lit w/ brite yellow s/w hovering  yet coming towards me looking in binoculars came closer & closer size bigger  had some kinda drk/grey symbols lines beam light  got briter closer & uprooted

content.detailedDescription: Its v shaped i have seen this twice and both times heading to san diego ... its really fast no sound no lights ..This is not military nor any craft i have ever seen .. second time i saw it ...It flew over my head and i actually ducked i can draw it ...This thing is really fast ..I watch the jets and plains all the time nothing i have ever seen go this fast. first time was mid day about 2 weeks before the second time i saw it ..That was at night..
content.summary: This i have seen twice v shape no sound very fast heading to san diego from escondido ...Its like i dull cloud that forms the shape? i can draw it ..It was fast enough that when i saw it fly over me i ducked my head no sound no lights

content.detailedDescription: Sitting in backyard saw coupe birds fly over when this fast flying white glowing object come from the south the abruptly slows down and continues going north i a straight line. as it kept going north it went behind some clouds and went out of sight.
content.summary: White fast flying object abruptly slows down

content.detailedDescription: At about 1030pm on 4/24/14 my wife wakes me up to some strange lights in the sky as i am walking outside i see about 10 fireball looking objects moving from side to side finally they come to a stop after 5 mins of being stuck n amazed it hit me to run inside and get my phone to capture what my eyes couldn't believe what i was seeing. after a few mins of recording the local police helicopter is surronding them after 5 -10 mins they disappear we start seeing planes driving by we also hear jets in the sky but none that we can see keep in mind i have about 5mins of footage i have not leaked the video for security purposes but now i think i am ready to expose this video i have a doubt in my mind that i need answered. when i went to work the next day i showed co workers one said she saw the same thing but thought they where chinese lanterns but what i saw where not chinese lanterns another conworker said he heard jets fly over his house around the same time of my recording he said it was so loud it woke him up
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Strange bright lights flying n staying at a holt for over 10mins

content.detailedDescription: Watch large ball float under moon. clear night.  not a star.  glowing ball just vanished as it moved down. i don't even believe in ufos
content.summary: Descending under the moon

content.detailedDescription:
1.Back porch smoking a cig
2.Noise/bright light
3. hellicoptor
4.Was getting closer...Then slowed down went up like a rocket
5.Weird
6. went above my house.
content.summary: Was on my back porch and saw a blue light then noticed it wasn't and airplane or hellicoptor. it was really loud.. there's audio on the video. what is this? email me back.

content.detailedDescription: I was at my neighbors house hanging out. everyone was going to bed so my girlfriend and i walked home. i looked up in the sky and saw 3 disk shaped objects moving slowly through the sky. at first they looked liked stars because i have blurred vision but i knew they couldn't be planets or stars because i could see no other stars on a clear night. i was able to see, by squinting, that it looked like a black circle surrounded in roughly 10 lights on the outer rim of the disk. my girlfriend confirmed what i believed i saw. they all spun slowly and moved independently of each other. one stayed in the distance, barely visible, to the south of me. one other started close to me and moved to the west. the last one traveled from the south toward me and turned to the east directly at me when i was waving my arms around. it then started making erratic movements that didn't seem to make any sense for a ship to be making in my opinion. it looked almost alive. some movements seemed to be in right angles but it still appeared to be moving fairly slowly from my vantage point. i couldn't believe i could see it so clearly. they didn't seem to be trying to hide themselves at all. i thought it was incredible. it then turned off it's lights and i could see the actual object. it looked like it had a bell top but was difficult to fully make out. i couldn't tell if it changed shapes. after about a minute or so it turned the lights back on. at that point it turned back into what looked to be a black disk again and continued moving side to side toward me. i think that it saw me and may have been making signals because i can see no other reason it would continue moving in these directions. why i believe this is because it ultimately didn't go very far at all until 5 am when i lost sight of it and the other two, as they disappeared off to the west and one to the south west of me.(i live just to the east of the willamette river in milwaukie, or. btw...) before they left though, the one that looked like it saw me continued making the erratic movements including bouncing up and down and started to go a little faster. definitely the the craziest thing i've ever seen in my life. i have no doubt that this technology was extraterrestrial. hopefully other people saw what my girlfriend and i saw and can possibly confirm and give further details i may have missed. unfortunately i have no video or photos. my camera wasn't good enough to see it in the dark. thank you for reading
content.summary: 3 spinning disks moving slowly. when lights were off we could see whole object otherwise it was black surrounded in lights most of the time

content.detailedDescription:
I had spotted something up in the sky. myself and a friend of mine we had seen this strange light or star like object something up in the sky towards the west and southwest; just a bit above the horizon.

i did measure this with my fists and i came up with three fists high off the horizon. this event was taken place on the evening of thursday april 30 2014 at exactly 8:44pm cst or  24 hour time which is 2044 (20hr 44min)

this time i use my tripod and i use my iphone with a app called procamera. the both of us were outside for at least about 15 to 20 minutes or so, while we were having a smoke break.       i was smoking my cigar and my friend smoked is cigarette.

both of us are into stargazing astronomy with the chicago astronomical society, and we are just beginners and we are learning about the stars and planets of the nighttime sky.

also during this event, i had called our il mufon investigator jim wolford at around 9:15pm thursday april 30 2014. i had also emailed jim wolford both of my photo and video explaining what i had seen up in the night sky.

i am sending a clear steady shot of both of my video and a still photo picture of a close-up of what we had seen on thursday april 30 2014 at exactly 8:44pm cst or 24 hour time 2044 (20hr 44min)
content.summary: Strange star liked object up in the night time sky by chicago midway neighborhood

content.detailedDescription: While sitting in traffic on the mid- point bridge, i noticed a small dark object about 1000 yards away above the trees. i was on the phone with my wife and i told her there's something on the tree line. as i slowly made it over the bridge the object got closer. once i made it over the bridge the object was close enough to see detail. it got t to the point where it was right in front of my car about 200 feet off the ground. it was wobbling slowly as it drifted in front of me. it was only moving maybe ten miles per hour in a roughly se to nw direction. the object had a large central section, similar looking to a soccer ball, but not round, slightly angular. it was a dark gray/black color but the sun was reflecting off of the top of the east side of it. it had three legs, all segmented, maybe three segments on each leg. they appeared evenly spaced. it went right over my car then i lost sight of it as the traffic started moving. i'm going to make a computer drawing of it when i get home, i just wanted to get this in while it was fresh ibn my mind.
content.summary: Saw on the hirizon, approached while in traffic
